verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:27
verses.text: The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:28
verses.text: Of Mahli came Eleazar, who had no sons.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:29
verses.text: Concerning Kish: the son of Kish was Jerahmeel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:30
verses.text: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:31
verses.text: These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king, and Zadok, and Ahimelech, and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites, even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.
